turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey April. How are you today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hey Jerri. I'm good. What can I help you with today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you think you can place an order for me at Peet's?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to try one of their seasonal drinks. The Golden Caffe Latte sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What's the specifics for the drink. Let me get a pen and paper to write it down.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Let me know when you're ready.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: *a couple seconds later.* I'm ready! Go.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay let's get a medium size with two percent milk. If they ask about whip cream, you can add that topping.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, two percent and medium size. Got it. Do you want any extra sugar? And thing else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, grab some extra sugar packets if you don't mind. Also two butter crossiants.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay great. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that's it. You can also get anything you want and just charge it to the Peet's account.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Thanks, Jerri. Is it the Michigan or Clark's Peet's?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Clark street one. The one at 3025 Clark St.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I'll get to that call right away. Give me a minute.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No problem.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: *5 minutes later* Okay your order has been placed. It'll be ready at the Clark location in about ten minutes. Anything else I can do for you right now, Jerri?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. Thanks so much April. I don't know where I would be without you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: *laughs* It's no problem. Talk to you later and have a good day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You too, goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Goodbye.
